text: And Allah also revealed about 'Uthman Ibn 'Affan when he said: �O Messenger of Allah! If you so wish, I will give up all my wealth� and so Allah said: (He who obeyeth Allah and His messenger) in His judgement, (and feareth Allah) in that which has passed, (and keepeth duty (unto Him)) in the future: (such indeed are the victorious) they have gained Paradise and are saved from the Fire.
